subject: Career
title: Digital Detox and Screen Fatigue
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Digital Detox and Screen Fatigue.

hook.text: Average screen time for remote workers: 13 hours per day. Your eyes, brain, and body are paying the price.

buildup.text: Blue light disrupts melatonin. Constant screen use causes digital eye strain, headaches, and poor sleep.

discovery.text: The 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. It reduces strain by 50%.

twist.text: Notifications keep pulling you back. Turn off non-essential alerts after hours. Your phone can wait.

climax.text: Build screen-free rituals: paper books at night, walking meetings, and analog hobby time.

punchline.text: Your screen is a tool, not a companion. Disconnect to recharge.

quiz.question: What is the 20-20-20 rule for reducing screen fatigue?
options: Every 20 min, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds
